class.name: OpenTelemetryTracer
class.brief_description: Represents an instrumentation scope for creating spans in distributed tracing.
class.description: OpenTelemetryTracer represents an instrumentation scope identified by name, version, schema URL, and attributes. It is created by OpenTelemetryTracerProvider and used to create spans for distributed tracing.

method.name: enabled
method.description: Returns whether this tracer is enabled. Currently always returns [code]true[/code].

method.name: get_attributes
method.description: Returns the attributes associated with this tracer's instrumentation scope.

method.name: get_name
method.description: Returns the name of this tracer's instrumentation scope.

method.name: get_schema_url
method.description: Returns the schema URL associated with this tracer's instrumentation scope.

method.name: get_version
method.description: Returns the version of this tracer's instrumentation scope.
